extends java.lang.Object

    Gary Chen

        public void getHit​(double hitstunAmount,
                   double angle,
                   double knockbackSpeed,
                   double damage)
        Handle effects after getting hit by an attack.
        Parameters:
        hitstunAmount - Amount of hitstun to inflict
        angle - Angle to send knockback into
        knockbackSpeed - Speed character will get knocked back
        damage - Number of damage to inflict
